name: Ciprofloxacin

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A CORN

contraindications: Ciprofloxacin tablets should be administered orally as described in the appropriate Dosage Guidelines tables.
warningsAndPrecautions:
Ciprofloxacin Tablets, USP 500 mg are available as oval shaped, white film-coated tablets, debossed with “Y102” on one side.
